homepage.text: Your framework for presentation and management of digital content

image.title: versatile
image.description: for repositories, archives, digitised image collections and much more

image.description: with own data model, search function, layout for your own repository

newsentry.title: Developer Conference
newsentry.message: The first meeting of all MyCoRe developer 2016 took place at the University Hamburg from 1. until 3. March.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Release 2016.02
newsentry.message: The last Release bevore the next LTS is out now at 24.02.2016.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: MIR Developement
newsentry.message: This year we will have the first LTS of the application MIR in conjunction with MyCoRe LTS release.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The institutional repository "GWIN" is - based on MIR - at the Fakulty of Humanities of Univ. Hamburg now online.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
